segments.text: It's truly a moment frozen in time, full of strange contradictions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water, the oblivious adult, the daring children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by how many things can go wrong simultaneously in one space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of that overflowing sink just bothers me immensely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a careless waste of a precious resource.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are playing with fire, metaphorically speaking, on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me want to shout at the woman to pay attention!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely disengaged from their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall composition of this scene is quite telling about human nature.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: We can be so focused on one task that we miss everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope this doesn't end in a big mess or injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of potential domestic mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR
